name: Telekinetic Spider Chef Makes Some Sandwiches
name_original: Telekinetic Spider Chef Makes Some Sandwiches
description:
Some things that aren't mentioned in the game (maybe I should have):

- Find yourself in an apple-pickle sandwich? Press SHIFT+R to restart.

- If you don't like the spider crawling sounds you can mute them by pressing M. If you want to mute all sounds just mute your computer volume.

The sound effects were made with various instruments.
